body.p: Be sure to check out the new Graphics section and our new "Powered by Gentoo Linux" logo. Developers will also be interested in Grant Goodyear's new User-Mode Linux Guide. Like VMWare, User-Mode Linux will allow you to run a virtual Linux system on your PC. But unlike VMWare, User-Mode Linux is free :) Also, a new version 1.9 of keychain (a ssh-agent manager) has been released. Enjoy! Work on Gentoo Linux 1.0 continues to go well. Oh -- almost forgot! Check out our updated About Gentoo Linux section, now featuring our groovy cow poster that made its debut at this year's FOSDEM. The page has also been updated to reflect the forthcoming Gentoo Linux 1.0 release.
